p: Although the vast majority of studies have focused on evaluating the potential of NTAP for the decontamination of solid foods, some authors have addressed its efficacy in liquid foods, obtaining also in some occasions promising results. Thus, up to 5 log reductions have been obtained for E. coli in orange and apple juice after a treatment of 8 and 40 s, respectively, and treatments of 12 and 25 s had a similar lethality effect for S. aureus and Candida albicans, respectively (Shi et al., 2011; Liao et al., 2018).
